pkgmetadata.longdescription: Miscellaneous Extensions to 'ggplot2' // Extensions to 'ggplot2' respecting the grammar of graphics paradigm. Specialization of method ggplot(): accept and convert on the fly time series data. Geom: "table", adds tables to plots. Statistics: locate and tag peaks and valleys in 2D plots; count observations in different quadrants of a plot; select observations based on 2D density; label with the equation of a polynomial fitted with lm() or other types of models; labels with P-value, R^2 or adjusted R^2 or information criteria for fitted models; label with ANOVA table for fitted models; label with summary for fitted models. Model fit classes for which suitable methods are provided by package 'broom' are supported.
